title: Christopher Young on Scoring The Dark Half and Pet Sematary
itunes:title: Christopher Young on Scoring The Dark Half and Pet Sematary
itunes:subtitle: Legendary composer Christopher Young talks with Losers' Club co-host Michael Roffman about scoring this year's Pet Sematary and the lessons he learned from working with George A. Romero on The Dark Half and Clive Barker on Hellraiser. The two...
description:
Legendary composer Christopher Young talks with Losers' Club co-host Michael Roffman about scoring this year's Pet Sematary and the lessons he learned from working with George A. Romero on The Dark Half and Clive Barker on Hellraiser. The two of them also connect on their shared love for holiday decorations, particularly pumpkins and jack-o-lanterns for Halloween. 


Follow us on Facebook | Twitter | Instagram | Patreon


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
